title: Flood QRF - San Diego’s Restoration Experts

hero.heading: 24/7 Emergency Water Damage Response
hero.subheading: Fast, certified mitigation for homes and businesses across San Diego County.

services_intro.heading: Our Services
services_intro.subheading: Everything you need to stop damage fast, dry the structure, and prevent long-term issues.

services.title: Water Extraction
services.description: Fast removal of water to prevent further damage.

services.title: Structural Drying
services.description: Industrial dehumidification and monitoring to fully dry your home.

services.title: Mold Remediation
services.description: Safe containment and removal to restore indoor air quality.

additional_services_intro.heading: Additional Services
additional_services_intro.subheading: When the job needs more than drying — we can handle the heavy lifting too.

additional_services.title: Pack-outs & Contents Handling
additional_services.description: Careful inventory, packing, transport, and storage coordination to protect what matters.

additional_services.title: Selective Demolition
additional_services.description: Controlled tear-out of wet materials to accelerate drying and reduce rebuild scope.

additional_services.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
additional_services.description: Detailed cleanup after rebuild so you can get back to normal, faster.

steps.title: 1) Call or Request Service
steps.text: Tell us what happened. We’ll dispatch and guide you on immediate next steps.

steps.title: 2) Mitigate & Dry
steps.text: We extract water, set equipment, and monitor moisture until dry targets are met.

steps.title: 3) Document for Insurance
steps.text: Photos, readings, and line-item notes to support your claim and reduce friction.

our_story_preview.heading: Our Story
our_story_preview.text: Flood QRF was built for one reason: to deliver disciplined, reliable restoration when people need it most.

team_preview.heading: Meet the Team
team_preview.text: Certified technicians and project leads who treat your home like their own.

members.name: Lead Technician
members.bio: Specializes in extraction, containment, and drying strategy.

members.name: Project Lead
members.bio: Keeps timelines clear and communication tight with you and your carrier.

members.name: Contents Specialist
members.bio: Inventory, protection, and coordination for contents handling.

blog_preview.heading: From the Blog
blog_preview.text: Practical guidance for water emergencies, insurance documentation, and drying timelines.

posts.title: The First 60 Minutes After a Water Loss
posts.excerpt: What to do immediately to reduce damage and protect your claim.

posts.title: How Long Does Structural Drying Take?
posts.excerpt: Typical timelines, what impacts them, and how we verify dryness.

posts.title: Insurance Documentation: What Adjusters Need
posts.excerpt: Photos, readings, and notes that help a claim move faster.

items.a: Yes. We document the loss, provide moisture logs, and coordinate with your carrier as needed.
Availability varies, but we prioritize emergency calls and aim for rapid response across San Diego County.
We focus on mitigation, drying, and associated services like pack-outs and selective demo. Rebuild can be coordinated with your preferred contractor.
